Это шедевр! Эта игра просто лучшая среди тех, которые я видел, ребят, покупайте и скачивайте, эта игра своих денег стоит однозначно!

官方貌似终于知道以前血点来的太慢了，做出了修改。但是我的朋友们都已经玩腻了，都弃坑了，如果游戏不能有一些玩法上的新突破， 就很难让老玩家重新回来了。想想当初我还花那么多钱在eBay买了个光头，现在也不怎么玩了。

希望如果官方能出个长期活动就是超过3个月没有玩的玩家 回归有例如50万或者100万血点奖励，然后一年购买的老玩家回归直接获得100万血点奖励之类的。我觉得这个游戏好好运营还是能有许多玩家回归的。

最后加一句，希望你们能支持60hz以上的fps，例如144hz。
说封号就封号，完全什么都不知道，自己电脑玩，莫名其妙说什么检测外挂掉线，隔了几天就封号，服气

Das Spiel ist ein riesiges What-If. An sich ist das Gameplay des Spiels echt gut und auch einzigartig. Die Grafik ist zwar nicht immer die genauste, aber demnoch recht schön anzusehen.
Der größte Haken an diesem Spiel ist das Matchmaking, was ABSOLUT desolat ist. Wenn man mit Freunden spielen will ist es teils unmöglich ein Spiel zu finden, was dann meistens auch eher unfair gematcht wird. Als Jäger hat man gegen ein gut organisiertes Team keine Chance zu gewinnen, genau wie man als Überlebender wegen campingproblemen oft sehr frustriert ist.
Falls sich das Lobby und Matchmaking System nicht ändert sehe ich das Game realistisch auf einem fairen Preis von 5€, da das eigentlich tolle Gameplay vom grauenhaften Lobby System runtergezogen wird.
После многочисленных обновлений, данный продукт стал более интереснее, но багов не меньше... 6/10. Порекомендую все-же!)
For 20 dollars this game is a great deal as you can spend a lot of time on it. Only real downside are some queuing issues and other side bugs, but they don't ruin the core of this game at all.

This game is not meant for everyone, so if you're the type that would get annoyed for always being camped, I suggest you  avoid this game because that's what it's all about from the lowest rank. You need to put your deviotion in mastering this game if you really wanna have fun. And it takes more than devotion, you need to have the motivation to do it. But let's get straight to the point, this game is all about teamwork and surviving on your own, you'll also need to use your brain to outsmart the killer, and not every round goes the way you want it to.

Tl;dr: This game is good and you'll get your money's worth of gameplay out of it. However it has many flaws that can and probably will cause you to steer clear of it in it's triple digit hours. I would still personally reccomend you get it though.

If you're going to read my long ass and quite controversial review, here's a short overview of the actual gameplay for you.

THE GAME:

SURVIVOR: You must escape and survive the round. You do this by fixing the generators scattered around the map. You need atleast 5 generators fixed to escape, and have 3 other survivors you can and probably should work together with to win. However, the killer will try to prevent you from escaping by damaging worked on generators (not finished) and trying to sacrifice and chase found survivors. You can (and should) help your endangered survivors by healing them if they're bleeding (as they'll make noise and leave a trail of blood when bleeding) or if they're already on the hook, take em off of it. Obviously that's a short version of it but hey, that's BASICALLY it.

KILLER: You must sacrifice the aforementioned survivors to the one and only spider god, The Entity. You do this by hitting the survivors twice, one to injure them, the second to make them flop to the floor. Once they're sufficiently flopped you pick them up (WARNING: They can wiggle out of your grasp if you take too long, or stab you once during the match to get out if they have a specific perk) and carry them to the hook. Once they're hooked the entity will slowly engulf the hook, once the entity has progressed though the entire hook, that survivor will be sacrificed and lose the match. You technically win after one sacrifice, but should always shoot for being an overachiever and try to get all four.

Now that you know how to play the game, assuming you didn't already, the actual review will now start. Warning: It's long and sorta controversial in its opinions so, yeah.

Okay, so this game is getting a lot of hate, and honestly, it kinda deserves it. Those points (which I'll get to in a bit) are valid. However, I don't really think that those problems are big enough to "steer clear" of the whole game as MANY reviews state. This game has issues, yes, but it's really one of the most original and creative games to come out in recent years. Not to mention incredibly addictive torwards the start of when you first get it. But, just to gloss over some of the big pros and cons, I'll list some pros and cons. 

PROS:
Gameplay itself is fun and original, if not a bit repetitive when you know what you're doing. You won't find many other titles that have similar gameplay to this game, and it's pretty damn fun when you first start out.
Lots of charm. This game is pretty far out there when you think about it... Spider god feasting on some random kids to harvest their "hope" huh, well that's interesting... Not to mention an interesting but admittingly incomplete lore if you look for it.
Pretty damn skill based, now a lot of people could disagree with me on this but getting to rank one isn't easy. It's a game you can very well "git gud" at. If people disagree, just ask them to pull a "kobe" as survivor or be able to track blood and identify breathing as a killer. It takes practice!
Different survivors with different perks that impact playstyle. While this may not hold up later in the game experience, it matters hugely at the very beginning. Wanna run? Meg. Wanna boost effiency? Dwight. Wanna heal? Claudette. Wanna be a pain in the killer's ass? Jake!
Different killers with different perks and hugely different abilities.  This holds up all game, if you choose to play a killer you will need to test them all out. There's a killer for each playstyle, and even some adaptability for some of them. Like, if you like how the Trapper looks but hate taking the time to set traps, just play "Man with a machete" mode, who even cares?
Learnable maps that are randomly generated, to an extent. Some maps are way more different than others, such as "Gas Heaven" being part of the same set as "Autohaven Wreckers" they seriously aren't that alike at all. However, most are just rearranged closests and chests, which allow for some degree of memorization.
Just to mention it, this game IS infinitely more fun with friends, the difference is that this game makes it near paramount. It completely changes the nature of the game. I highly reccomend that a friend has the game, you buy a friend the game, or even make some friends while playing the game.

CONS:
Okay so it's about to seem like I hate the game, which isn't THAT true. It just has a lot of flaws that do need to be adressed. The devs often livestream, and do seem like nice guys, but I'm just not sure if they ever do fix the many things that they know and address that are broken.
For a start, Campers are fucking everywhere, jesus. There seriously needs to be a fix or some kind of counter to this. So far the only counter is "Lmao forget that dying guy let's just fix more gens XD!!!" which, this might just be me, makes me kinda sad. I should have the power to save him! So far the only perk that addresses this is something called "Borrowed Time" which allows you to stay standing after being hit as long as you took that hit to save someone. Seeing as the effect is temporary, and can only be used once during a match really ruins the perk for me. The sad thing is, this may never be fixed as one of the Devs is a camping trapper main.
Matchmaking, oh lord the matchmaking. This really needs to be fixed, and was fixed for a while, but broke again. How does that happen? Anyway, what happens is that it takes a LONG time to get into games, and when you do get in game, you might be in a game with four rank 1 survivors as a rank 20 killer, or vice versa. One protip though, as a reward for reading this huge thing: If you join via "Survive with friends" instead of play as survivor your chance of getting in a game will be heightened dramatically. Even if you don't invite any friends to the queue.
Cheap strats, cause in a game that is as grindy as this game is, why actually play when you can cheapskate your way through it? This does include camping, but I'm also calling out saboteur (which allows survivors to break hooks) and machine gun builds (which essentially make you die if you get hit once). But, because they're perks that have been packaged with the game they're obviously totally fine and fair. C'mon guys seriously, y'know they make the game boring and not fun for anyone and everyone, just stop? K?
The Community, now I actually kinda disagree about this one. But it is still worthy of mention. More often than not, the killer you did so well against will complain and flame you in end game chat. Or, the survivors that you steamrolled will have a nice circlejerk on your performance. However, what game doesn't have this problem? Maybe not to the extent of this game's community but I still have made plenty of friends playing it, and honestly, it really doesn't bother that much. Nor did it really ever bother me. Still, if that's a problem for you, that's understandable, and be aware of the community.
There's more problems, but I feel like you get the big picture.

So, again, overall this game has a lot of bugs. Those bugs are somewhat gamebreaking and I'm not sure if they'll be fixed. However, those problems won't pop up until like level 30-40 and maybe like 50 hours into the game. A $20 dollar game. Get it for those first 50 hours, cause it truly is something magical, hell I have 150+ hours and I still enjoy it wholeheartedly. Just be careful not to wear yourself out on it because it IS repetitive. 

So, if you read this huge ol' review and liked it, feel free to leave a comment. Played the game and disagree with the review? Comment why below. I'm actually interested, no, seriously, I mean it. Anyway, I hope you get the game and enjoy it, maybe even make some friends while playing it. So uh, bye and have a good day.

Dead by Daylight это когда 
За маньяка:
- в роли выживших бригада ремонтников
- в роли выживших бригада ломателей крюков
- в роли выживших бригада 911
- в роли выживших рекламщики, которые очень хотят продемонстрировать свои прожекторы, тебе в лицо
- в роли выживших плачющие дети, что ты кемперишь, хотя ты пришёл с другого конца карты -_-
- в роли выживших пользователи Ростелекома с деревянным компом
За выжившего:
- в роли маньяка, человек, котрорый хочет слушать твоё дыхание пока ты на крюке
- в роли маньяка, медсестра, которой пофиг на всё, это блинканётся к тебе и положит
- в роли маньяка, пользователь Ростелекома с деревянным компом
- в роли твоей команды, suicide squad 
- в роли твоей команды, люди которые сами за себя, они оставят тебя висеть на крюке, хоть ты и спасал их и сбегут
- в роли твоего тиммейта, человек, который захочет познакомить тебя с местным маньяком, которого он позвал с собой
- в роли твоей команды, стадо слонов, роняющие все возможные доски и шифтующие 24/7
- в роли твоей команды, бригада крушителей генераторов

After playing it for the last month, I can say its a real fun multiplayer game. The thing that kind of inhibits that muliplayer experience is that playing with your friends in "survive with friends" takes WAY to long to get a match, if you're even lucky enough to get a match in the first place. It seems to be a bug, because I have no problem joining lobbies. 
There's a slight learning curve for new players, but once you get past that and maybe friend a couple of fellow players, you will be up and running in no time. There's still room for improvement though, so I recommend picking it up for on sale.

Кароче худшая игра в плане недороботокю Если вы всю игру отигрываете на максимум а потом маньяк решил ливнуть, ХОБА минус капля и бладпоинты ( МИНУС НЕРВЫ). И это очень часто или хост (то есть маньяк) с худшим интернетом и вас тепешит по всей карте (Вне зависимости от интернета). Так что если хотите нормально поиграть и сохранить оставшиеся нервы не советую брать этот продукт (дерьмо). Этот отзыв будет актуален еще минимум год так как разрабы не желают это фиксить. и да если ты зайдешь в первой же катке тебя повесят и будут кемперить. Удачи и пусть помогут вам боги сохранить свои нервы если вы попытаетесь в это поиграть.

This game is pretty fantastic. It can be very competitive and I am sure people have not stopped being toxic in the after game chats. But the Devs have helped make the game come a long way. I remember the days when the only way to rank up was to survive (as survivor) or kill all four player (as killer.) Now you can rank up from playing all aspects of the game and it has help decrease the toxicity greatly. This was my first game on steam, back in the days when I used my  laptop, and will always hold a soft spot. I hope it just continues to grow, and it looks like it will, over 10 DLC packs later! <3

Cuando compre el juego me gusto mucho, y lo jugué demasiado (+ de 1000 horas), pero he notado que con cada asesino nuevo que sacan echan a perder el juego, el nuevo asesino es muy difícil de enfrentar a comparación de otros (me refiero a la legión), este personaje puede herir bastante rápido a los supervivientes para que estos mientras se curan (pierden mucho tiempo curándose) el asesino mata a uno, y mientras los demás se curan nadie repara generadores. 

Otro punto negativo es que siempre que actualizan el juego sacan más ventajas para los asesinos, ¿por que?, por que su comunidad es mala y lloriquea cuando tiene un asesino y no logra matar a nadie, es verdad que hay varios jugadores con el papel de superviviente que juegan muy bien, pero es por que llevan sus horas de juego, no por eso tienes que dar mucha ventaja al asesino a cada rato.



Otro punto son los DLC, antes los DLC eran personajes (superviviente y asesino), ahora hay skins y no estoy en contra de eso, pero pareciera que se enfocan en sacar skins en lugar de optimizar bien el♥♥♥♥♥♥juego.

No todo esta mal, pero ahorita como superviviente te jodes!, si tu equipo es malo...te jodes, el asesino puede ser un idiota con pocas horas de juego y con eso mata fácil mente a 2 o 3 supervivientes de un equipo organizado.

El rendimiento del juego ha mejorado, pero su juego en linea varia mucho, últimamente lleva un mes que no puedo jugar de asesino... No sé por que...pero bueno...

Reseña vieja: (La mejor opción si deseas ser un asesino o un sobreviviente de una película de horror.)
camping

El juego ha mejorado muchísimo, es cierto que en ocasiones tarda mucho en enontrar partida si vas como superviviente pero por lo demás está muy bien y es extremadamente adictivo, jugando tanto como killer como superiviente.

这游戏迟早要完，那些开挂改档的人不打击，偏偏提高正常玩家的门槛 我怕是以后DBD不会再有任何绿色玩家了 清一色全TM改档解锁全DLC去了。圣所门槛变高，共享技能门槛变高，不管是白嫖党变难了，就连氪佬也得把新角色肝到三转才能解锁三级共享技能，这简直是太尼玛搞笑了，这边建议出门右转去TB吧。

Just after the updated version 6.1.0 yesterday, I can't stand this stupid game again after directly changing the game mechanism for so many years. Today I just come to scold directly！

The game will end sooner or later. Those who open the modifier to change the archive will not be banned, but raise the threshold for normal players. I'm afraid there will be no green players in DBD in the future. In the future, all of them will open the modifier to change the archive and unlock the full DLC. The threshold of sanctuary and sharing skills has become higher. No matter how difficult it is for free players, even paying players have to practice their new characters to three turns to unlock Level 3 sharing skills. This is simply too funny！！！！！！ FK You ！！！！！！！！！
